etymology.description: Pictogram: pictographic representation of an umbrella; simplified from 傘 (𠈌 → 丷).
etymology.interpretation: Depicts an umbrella canopy with a central handle, originally with figures under it. The simplified form streamlines the under-canopy element into two short strokes while retaining the overall umbrella silhouette.
etymology.simplification: Stroke reduction by replacing the under-canopy component 𠈌 with the simpler 丷, preserving the canopy/handle outline.

examples.chinese: 下雨了(下雨了)，别忘了打伞(別忘了打傘)。
examples.pinyin: Xià yǔ le, bié wàng le dǎ sǎn.
examples.english: It’s raining; don’t forget to use an umbrella.

examples.chinese: 伞兵从天空降落(傘兵從天空降落)。
